Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Extract global logic into domain-specific providers

Refactor App.jsx to extract state management into 5 context providers:
- SettingsProvider: Settings, theme, sidebar state, hydration
- DialogProvider: Confirm dialog management
- DirtyStateProvider: Unsaved changes tracking and confirmation
- NavigationProvider: Navigation with dirty state checks
- ConfigProvider: File cache, section data, initialization

Changes:
- Created src/state/ folder with 5 new providers
- Reduced App.jsx by ~200 lines
- Reduced AppRouter props from 14 to 2
- Updated Providers.jsx with new provider composition
- Moved ToastProvider to Providers.jsx for better hierarchy
- Updated ConfigFileList to use contexts instead of props

Benefits:
- Eliminated 40-50 instances of prop drilling
- Replaced fragile window event synchronization with proper context
- Cleaner separation of concerns
- Better code maintainability

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
